definition: dichlorvos C4H7Cl2PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide (loanword)/also called dimethyl dichloro-vinyl phosphate DDVP

sentences.english: Results: Trichoderma sp. FM10 highly degrades dichlorvos.
sentences.chinese: 結果木黴FM10對敵敵畏有高效降解性。

sentences.english: The results show that ozonation is an efficient way for treating dichlorvos.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，臭氧氧化法是處理敵敵畏的高效方法。

sentences.english: Propoxur and DDVP are sensitive to Blattella germanica.
sentences.chinese: 對殘殺威和敵敵畏尚敏感。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficacy of DDVP aerosol against Blattella germanica.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解敵敵畏熱煙霧劑對德國小蠊的殺滅效果。
